conclusion: Plan to analyze image and apply geometric principles to find speed relationship.
Image shows two scenarios with paths labeled and includes angles and distances.
Light path is shortest when reflecting at an angle minimizing total distance.
Xiao Ming needs to reach Xiao Zhang by running or swimming.
Xiao Ming runs at speed v1 on the beach and swims at speed v2 in the sea, with v1 > v2.
Shortest path for Xiao Ming is along route 3, path of least distance.
Set up a proportion based on geometric similarity of paths.
Angle of incidence equals angle of reflection, so angle 1 = angle 3 and angle 2 = angle 4.
Ratio of distances equals ratio of speeds: AB/BC = v1/v2.
Since angle 1 = angle 3 and angle 2 = angle 4, AB/BC = AC/BD.
Given v1 > v2, the ratio v1/v2 is greater than 1.
